attributes.action: Let England have an independence referendum , solving the Brexit crisis
attributes.additional_details:
In 2014 the Scottish voters were told that by voting for independence it would mean that if the country gained its independence, it would AUTOMATICALLY leave the EU .
So it would also be true for England .
attributes.background: If England decides to become independent, it would leave the U.K. and The EU over night. And allow England to forge its own path in the future . Allowing Wales/Scotland and NI to stay in the EU as the Political entity called the U.K.
